en: So Allah will protect them from the evil of that Day
and give them radiance and happiness
And will reward them for what they patiently endured
[They will be] reclining therein on adorned couches.
They will not see therein any [burning] sun
And near above them are its shades,
and its [fruit] to be picked will be lowered in compliance.
And there will be circulated among them vessels
and cups having been [created] clear [as glass],
of which they have determined the measure.
And they will be given to drink a cup [of wine]
[From] a fountain within it [i.e., Paradise] named Salsabeel.
